segments.text: I only started looking for a job a few days ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: have you finished compiling your resume ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , I was precise with every word in my resume ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's good . Don't forget to design the format . An attractive format is as important as the content .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: absolutely , I've highlighted all my strengths and the resume is clear and easy to read .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: good . How about your cover letter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: a cover letter ? I've never thought about that . Won't a CV do for my job application ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no , a CV is not enough . You should also attach it with a cover letter . Don't overlook it . You're faced with fierce competition in the job market . If your cover letter cannot stand out in the pile of
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sounds reasonable.Even if I'm the right one for the job , many people are applying for the same vacancy at the same time , so I should try my best to catch the Human Resources manager's attention .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , you're right . All your preparation efforts are to help you land a job interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: got it . I'll start right now .
segments.speaker: S2
